casebody.data:
JOHN SARNICKI, PETITIONER-PETITIONER, v. HATFIELD WIRE AND CABLE DIVISION OF CONTINENTAL COPPER AND STEEL INDUSTRIES, INC., RESPONDENT-RESPONDENT. Mr. Emanuel Gersten for the petitioner. Mr. Isidor Kalisch for the respondent. June 11, 1962.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
